modName: Dawnguard Rewritten Arvak - Convenient Alsvid Patch
summary: This makes it so that the horse that Serana uses, Alsvid, uses Oriius\'s much, much, much better rendition of Arvak (the flame atronach version).
descriptionHtml:
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Dawnguard Rewritten Arvak - Convenient\'s Alsvid
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////



This makes it so that the horse that Serana uses, Alsvid, uses Oriius\'s much, much, much better rendition of Arvak (well the flame atronach version).

There are 2 versions, 1 that uses the default sounds that was set up in Convenient Horses, and one that makes it so Alsvid uses the changes that Footstep Sounds Overhaul makes.


Requires:

Dawnguard
Dawnguard Rewritten - Arvak:			http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24019/
Convenient Horses:				        http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950/


Optional but highly suggested:
Footsteps Sounds Overhaul found here:		http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35467/
author: cmdo
